articles.title: Actor Lindsey Pearlman found dead after going missing in L.A. - CTV News

articles.title: C’mon C’mon reimagines Joaquin Phoenix as an introspective radio producer who interviews kids about the future - ABC News
articles.description: In Mike Mills's gentle, humanist drama C'mon C'mon, a public-radio producer seeks out to interview young people across America about their hopes and fears for the future — while unexpectedly saddled with a pint-sized travelling companion.
